Package coreapi

Class OrderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • coreapi.OrderService
  • public class OrderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a service provider and interface for the client to work with objects from the Order class. Modifying and operating an object of the order class should always be done through the methods provided here.
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Maria, Borja

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OrderService()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addProductToOrder​(Cafeteria cafet, OrderImpl ord, int productId, int quantity)
      Adds the indicated amount of product to the order passed as an argument.
      java.math.BigDecimal getDailyRegister​(Cafeteria coffe, java.time.LocalDate date)
      Returns the cash register from the indicated cafeteria on the designated day.
      void OrderStatus_Delivered​(OrderImpl ord)
      Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to DELIVERED if the order current status is IN_KITCHEN.
      void OrderStatus_Finished​(OrderImpl ord)
      Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to FINISHED if the order current status is PAYED.
      void OrderStatus_InKitchen​(OrderImpl ord)
      Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to IN_KITCHEN if the order has at least one product and its current status is OPEN.
      void OrderStatus_Payed​(OrderImpl ord)
      Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to PAYED if the order current status is either IN_KITCHEN or DELIVERED.
      void removeProductFromOrder​(Cafeteria cafet, OrderImpl ord, int productId, int quantity)
      Removes the indicated amount of product from the order passed as an argument.

    • Method Detail

      • addProductToOrder

        public void addProductToOrder​(Cafeteria cafet,
                              OrderImpl ord,
                              int productId,
                              int quantity)
                       throws InsufficientStockException
        Adds the indicated amount of product to the order passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        cafet - The Cafeteria related to the order.
        ord - The order to add the product to.
        productId - The id of the product to add to the order.
        quantity - The quantity of product to add to the order.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If there isn't enough stock of the product.

      • removeProductFromOrder

        public void removeProductFromOrder​(Cafeteria cafet,
                                   OrderImpl ord,
                                   int productId,
                                   int quantity)
                            throws InsufficientStockException,
                                   ProductNotContainedInOrderException
        Removes the indicated amount of product from the order passed as an argument.
        Parameters:
        cafet - The cafeteria related to the order.
        ord - The order to remove the product from.
        productId - The id of the product to remove from the order.
        quantity - The quantity of product to remove from the order.
        Throws:
        InsufficientStockException - If the quantity to remove is bigger than the quantity which is stock in the order
        ProductNotContainedInOrderException - If the product isn't in the basket

      • OrderStatus_InKitchen

        public void OrderStatus_InKitchen​(OrderImpl ord)
                           throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to IN_KITCHEN if the order has at least one product and its current status is OPEN.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the IN_KITCHEN status aren't met.

      • OrderStatus_Delivered

        public void OrderStatus_Delivered​(OrderImpl ord)
                           throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to DELIVERED if the order current status is IN_KITCHEN.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the DELIVERED status aren't met.

      • OrderStatus_Payed

        public void OrderStatus_Payed​(OrderImpl ord)
                       throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to PAYED if the order current status is either IN_KITCHEN or DELIVERED.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the PAYED status aren't met.

      • OrderStatus_Finished

        public void OrderStatus_Finished​(OrderImpl ord)
                          throws UnreachableStatusException
        Sets the status of the order passed as parameter to FINISHED if the order current status is PAYED.
        Parameters:
        ord - The order to change the status of.
        Throws:
        UnreachableStatusException - If the conditions to set the FINISHED status aren't met.

      • getDailyRegister

        public java.math.BigDecimal getDailyRegister​(Cafeteria coffe,
                                             java.time.LocalDate date)
        Returns the cash register from the indicated cafeteria on the designated day.
        Parameters:
        coffe - The cafeteria from which to calculate the cash register.
        date - The day to which calculate the cash register.
        Returns:
        Returns the combined cost of all orders made on the specified date.
